title: Blended Learning Course for Foundational Understanding and Application of Physiology

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Course designed for secondary education practitioners to apply physiology concepts in educational settings. Hybrid learning approach combining mobile-based microlearning and face-to-face workshops in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain major physiological processes of human systems and utilize related mathematical models.
Learners can develop lesson designs that apply physiological principles to secondary education settings.
Learners demonstrate the ability to apply physiological concepts to real educational contexts through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
